Class SlotModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • astre.entityDisambiguation.SlotModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class SlotModel
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Slot model in
    'Generative event schema induction with entity disambiguation'
    Code is based on
    http://www.arbylon.net/projects/LdaGibbsSampler.java
    Author:
    nguyen
    See Also:

    • Constructor Detail

      • SlotModel

        public SlotModel(Triple[][] documents,
         int nV_head,
         int nV_relation,
         int nV_attribute,
         int seed,
         boolean use_attribute)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        documents - list of documents, each document contains a list of tuple
        nV_head - Head vocabulary size
        nV_relation - trigger vocabulary size
        nV_attribute - attribute vocabulary size
        seed - random seed
        use_attribute - using attribute for sampling

         double beta_relation,
         double beta_attribute)
        Gibbs sampling
        Parameters:
        nK_slot - number of slots
        beta_head - head-slot Dirichlet
        beta_relation - head-trigger Dirichlet
        beta_attribute - head-attribute Dirichlet

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                        java.io.IOException,
                        org.apache.commons.cli.ParseException,
                        javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException,
                        org.xml.sax.SAXException
        Parameters:
        args -
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        java.io.IOException
        org.apache.commons.cli.ParseException
        javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException
        org.xml.sax.SAXException -
        Usage: SlotModel
        -att (optional) using attributes (default false)
        -beta_a (optional) att-slot dirichlet (default .1)
        -beta_h (optional) head-slot dirichlet (default 1)
        -beta_t (optional) trigger-slot dirichlet (default .1)
        -burn (optional) burn-in iterations (default 2000)
        -cut (optional) cut-off term frequency (default 5)
        -doc Stanford parsed documents directory
        -index output index file
        -iter (optional) number of iterations (default 10000)
        -lag (optional) sample lag (default 10)
        -model output model file
        -rand (optional) random seed (default 1)
        -slot (optional) number of slots (default 35)
        -step (optional) interval step (default 100)
